nodes.text: Star Wars Tales #12 is the twelfth issue in the Star Wars Tales series of comics. It was published on June 5, 2002 by Dark Horse Comics.

The Star Wars universe is painted with a wide and varied palate and this issue highlights that variety! Join Wedge Antilles as he valiantly fights squadrons of Imperial TIE fighters. Be there as Qui-Gon Jinn and his Padawan, Obi-Wan Kenobi, face off against Jedi killer Aurra Sing! Face the evil genius of Darth Vader! Witness a panicked Anakin Skywalker as he struggles to retrieve his stolen lightsaber! And stumble to a halt in the belly of the almighty Sarlacc with the bumbling Tag and Bink...This is one issue of Tales you won't want to miss!

The story "A Jedi's Weapon" was previously released as Star Wars: Tales—A Jedi's Weapon, a free comic from Dark Horse Comics for the first Free Comic Book Day in 2002. Free Comic Book Day occurs on the first Saturday in May.
